specification.mission: Draft a clear, developer-first post using the brief and contributed sections (How it Works, FAQ, Comparison) while avoiding repetition and hype.
workflow: Create an outline: Hook, Problem, What is PilotFrame?, How it Works, Core Capabilities, Use Cases, Getting Started, Roadmap (short), FAQ, Comparison, Conclusion.
If pricing/state/limitations are unknown, label them as MVP/TBD/Limitations openly.
Avoid repeated keyphrases; vary with pronouns/synonyms without losing precision.
Use measured language; replace hype with specific capabilities.
success_criteria: Includes 'How it Works' (or placeholder if unknown), FAQ, and Comparison when available.
No keyword stuffing; repetition metrics acceptable to Terminology Linter.
constraints: No hype words unless justified by data.
handoff_expectations: Complete draft + meta title/description + outline + repetition_metrics (term counts).
